anathema: Steal from the poor, beg for help or mercy from a fellow worshipper of Thamir
edict: Seize any opportunity that would benefit you, solve your problems with violence, hide your true intentions
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Thamir (The Silent Blade)](/Deities.aspx?ID=566)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 318

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Seize any opportunity that would benefit you, solve your problems with violence, hide your true intentions

**Anathema** Steal from the poor, beg for help or mercy from a fellow worshipper of Thamir

**Area of Concern**
Greed, opportunity, thievery

**Pantheons**
[Shadow Cabinet](/Deities.aspx?ID=372)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=64), [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=99)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Penumbral Shroud](/Spells.aspx?ID=2360)

- **3rd**
[Shared Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=2025)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=1605)

</column>
name: Thamir (The Silent Blade)
